docs.title: Setting up github pages w/ mkdocs
New site setup
docs.text:
pip install mkdocs
pip install mkdocs-material 
mkdocs new MyDocs

# choose one
mkdocs serve # This will run the server locally otherwise...
mkdocs build # this will generate the static files under ./site otherwise...
mkdocs gh-deploy # deploy will automatically generate and deploy static site to gh-pages branch
  • be sure to add site to ./.gitignore
  • check deployment status on github.com -> project -> actions -> pages-build-deployment

docs.title: Existing site setup
docs.text: • clone site, make changes/add pages under ./docs, re-run gh-deploy

docs.title: mathjax.js
docs.text:
./docs/javascript/mathjax.js

window.MathJax = {
  tex: {
    inlineMath: [["\\(", "\\)"]],
    displayMath: [["\\[", "\\]"]],
    processEscapes: true,
    processEnvironments: true
  },
  options: {
    ignoreHtmlClass: ".*|",
    processHtmlClass: "arithmatex"
  }
};

document$.subscribe(() => { 
  MathJax.typesetPromise()
})

docs.title: MathJax, block syntax
docs.text:
Blocks must be enclosed in \(\(...\)\) or [...] on separate lines: 

$$
\operatorname{ker} f=\{g\in G:f(g)=e_{H}\}{\mbox{.}}
$$
\[ \operatorname{ker} f=\{g\in G:f(g)=e_{H}\}{\mbox{.}} \]

docs.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
docs.text: These sections are my notes going through the Neural networks and Deep Learning Book

docs.title: Chapter 1 - Using neural nets to recognize handwritten digits
Configuring windows git w/ SSH
docs.text:
• Install ssh-agent in powershell, start service and add keys
Get-Service ssh-agent | Set-Service -StartupType Automatic -PassThru | Start-Service
start-ssh-agent.cmd
ssh-add path/to/ssh/private/key
  • Make sure keys are in ~/.ssh or specify
